mapper.update: update sea_myad set adname = #{adname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, adenname = #{adenname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timeset = #{timeset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=CHAR}, adsbody = #{adsbody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select aid, adname, adenname, timeset, intro, adsbody from sea_myad
